name: architecture
description: Buildings, spaces, and architectural design prompts
prompts: a modern glass skyscraper reflecting clouds against a blue sky
a Gothic cathedral with flying buttresses and stained glass windows
a bright modern kitchen interior with marble countertops and pendant lights
a 3D rendered floor plan of a two-bedroom apartment
a suspension bridge spanning a river at golden hour
a traditional Japanese temple surrounded by cherry blossom trees
a minimalist concrete house with large floor-to-ceiling windows
an aerial view of a city block with mixed-use buildings
a cozy library interior with floor-to-ceiling bookshelves and a reading nook
a futuristic eco-friendly building covered in vertical gardens
